Key Match Events: Shreyas Iyer scored 74 off 44 balls, powering India to a series-clinching seven-wicket victory.
Ravindra Jadeja scored 45 off 18 balls, helping India chase down the target of 184 with 17 deliveries to spare.
Sanju Samson contributed 39 off 25 balls, adding 84 runs for the third wicket with Iyer.
Post-Match Reflections: Shreyas Iyer and Ravindra Jadeja's performances were praised for their contributions to India's victory.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Rohit Sharma was dismissed for one in the final ball of the first over.
Dasun Shanaka scored an unbeaten 47 off 19 balls for Sri Lanka.
Pathum Nissanka top-scored with 75 off 53 balls for Sri Lanka.
